熲字的基本解释

熲
jiǒng
古同“炯”：“珥金貂之熲熲。”
警枕，古代用圆木做成、使睡后易觉醒的枕头。

熲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiǒng］
［《廣韻》古迥切，上迥，見。］
“颎1”的繁体字。
(1)光明。《诗·小雅·无将大车》：“無思百憂，不出于熲。”毛传：“熲，光也。”郑玄笺：“思衆小事以爲憂，使人蔽闇，不得出於光明之道。”一说为忧愁；心烦耳热。朱熹集传：“熲，與耿同，小明也。在憂中耿耿然不能出也。”马瑞辰通释：“熲音義與耿正同。《箋》謂'不出于光明之道'，失之。《集傳》謂'憂中耿耿然不能出'，是也；以熲謂小明，亦似未確。”
(2)警枕。用圆木做的枕头，使睡时易醒。

熲字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　熲； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页681第09
【唐韻】【韻會】【正韻】?古迥切，音炯。【說文】火光也。【廣韻】輝也。【詩·小雅】無思百憂不出于熲。【傳】熲，光也。　又【集韻】涓熒切，音扃。義同。或作耿。　又【五音集韻】古文耿字。註詳耳部四畫。◎按熲字，說文，玉篇，篇海，俱在火部，訓作火光。字彙，《正字通》，收入頁部，非。今特改正。

Basic explanation of words
熲
jiǒng
The ancient same "jiong": "The stun of Er Jin Sable."
Police pillows were made of logs in ancient times to make it easy to wake up after sleep.
熲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiǒng］
["Guangyun" Gu Jiong cut, Shang Jiong, see. ]
Traditional characters for "颎1".
(1) Bright. "Poetry·Xiaoya·Wujiang Wagon": "No thinking about all worries, not out of 熲." Mao Chuan: "熲, light." Zheng Xuanjian: "Thinking about the small things and worrying about it makes people conceal the darkness, not From the way of light." One said it was sorrow; it was upset and ears were hot. Zhu Xi's Collected Biography: "Xi, and Geng Tong, Xiao Ming. You can't get out of sorrow." Ma Ruichen explained: "Xi Yin has the same meaning as Geng Zheng. The "Jian" says that "not from the way of light", and it is lost. "The Collected Biography" says that'you can't get out of worries,' that is true; the term Xiao Ming by Xi is also unclear."
(2) Police pillow. Pillows made of logs make it easy to wake up during sleep.

[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Ancient Jiong cut, with bright sound. [Said the text] The fire is also. [Guang Yun] Hui Ye. [Poetry·Xiaoya] No thoughts and 100 worries are not out of 熲. [Biography] 熲, light also.　[Jiyun] Juan Yingqie, Yin Xun. The same meaning. Or make Geng.　[Five-tone Jiyun] Ancient Chinese Geng character. Note the four paintings of the ears. ◎According to the Chinese character, Shuowen, Yupian, Pianhai are all in the Fire Department, and they are taught as fire light.
